statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT email, profile_picture FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username='alice';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'Alice'
SELECT email, profile_picture FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'Bob'
SELECT username, email, profile_picture FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT email FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_friends WHERE user_id = 123 AND status = TRUE;
SELECT friend_id FROM user_friends WHERE user_id = 456 AND status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT email FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'Bob' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_friends WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_friends GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT email, username FROM user_profiles;
SELECT profile_picture FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, friend_id FROM user_friends ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_description FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT email, profile_picture FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_friends FROM user_friends WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activities WHERE activity_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT comment_id, comment_content FROM comments WHERE post_id = 5 AND user_id = 2;
SELECT like_id, post_id, created_at FROM likes WHERE user_id = 4 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT post_content, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments INNER JOIN user_profiles ON comments.user_id = user_profiles.id WHERE user_profiles.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT post_id, COUNT(like_id) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY like_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id1, user_id2 FROM friendships WHERE friend_since >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, p.post_text, c.comment_text FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id;
SELECT post_text FROM posts WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM likes WHERE like_date >= '2022-01-01');
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(l.like_id) AS total_likes FROM users u LEFT JOIN likes l ON u.user_id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_likes > 10;
